response.overview: The Boy Mechanic was commissioned in 1996 by the Museum of Photographic Arts in San Diego for the exhibition â€œRe: Public; Listening to San Diego." For this initial phase of the project I conducted 30 hours of videotaped interviews with San Diego lesbian bar patrons who took me to current and former sites of the bars in that town. The result was a 30-minute video about the history of lesbian bars in San Diego.
response.tagline: "The Boy Mechanic" is an ongoing project that will document the history of lesbian bars in cities and towns across the United States and Europe.
response.title: The Boy Mechanic San Diego
